A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is hard to express in words my disappointment. I love star wars. I have 37 years and i wait for a long time to know what happens after episode vi. In episode vii\, i filled my heart with hope to see my old heroes again\, and i could\, for a glimpse. Now... Well\, how i could express this without give you all a disfraceful spoiler? Well friends\, star wars is over for me\, alongside with my childhood heroes. Disney\, i'll return your disturbing lack of faith (lol)\, with anger and hate.
